Introduction¶

Welcome to MyParty Documentation!

MyParty is a Django-based web application that allows users to organize and manage political programs and events effortlessly. This documentation provides a comprehensive guide to setting up and using MyParty.

Features¶

  • Create and manage organisational events.

  • Keep track of the membership.

  • Update the followers on developments.

Getting Started¶

Before you begin, make sure you have Python and Django installed on your system. Follow the installation instructions in the next section.

Let’s get the party started!

myParty documentation
